title: Wasn't I suppose to get a hexchest at level 5?
body: I recently got to level 5 and i heard you get a free hexchest when you reach level 5. Well I got to level 5 and check and I don't see one. Is this a bug or did they remove this.

replies.body:
Sometimes there's a small delay before the chest shows up. I took a look at your account and it appears your chest is waiting for you. Simply hop into Hextech Crafting and you should see the chest and key waiting there to be opened! 


http://imgur.com/a/XGVH6


Let me know if you have any questions. :)
